pilots.name: “Odd Ball”
pilots.caption: CC-2237
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], you may acquire a lock on that ship.

pilots.name: “Jag”
pilots.caption: CT-55/11-9009
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 1-2 in your [Left Arc] or [Right Arc] defends, you may acquire a lock on the attacker.

pilots.name: Squad Seven Veteran
pilots.text: Clone Flight Seven serves as part of the Open Circle Fleet under legendary Jedi Generals such as Plo Koon and Obi-Wan Kenobi, and won glory at the battles of Coruscant and Cato Neimoidia.

pilots.name: “Wolffe”
pilots.caption: CC-3636
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary [Front Arc] attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 attack die. While you perform a primary [Rear Arc] attack, you may recover 1 [Charge] to roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: “Sinker”
pilots.caption: Wolfpack Veteran
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 1-2 in your [Left Arc] or [Right Arc] performs a primary attack, it may reroll 1 attack die.

pilots.name: 104th Battalion Pilot
pilots.text: The ARC-170 was designed as a dominating heavy escort fighter with powerful front and rear lasers, ordnance, and an astromech for navigation. Squadrons of these mighty ships bolster the Republic Navy's presence at any battle where they are deployed.

pilots.name: Anakin Skywalker

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Hero of the Republic
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, if there is an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1 or in your [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to remove 1 stress token.

pilots.name: Ahsoka Tano

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: “Snips”
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose a friendly ship at range 0-1 and spend 1 [Force]. That ship may perform an action, even if it is stressed.

pilots.name: Jedi Knight
pilots.text: When the Clone Wars began, the Jedi Knights rallied to the cause of preserving the Republic, assuming command of legions of clone troopers and leading them in battle.

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.name: Luminara Unduli

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Wise Protector
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, if it is not in the attacker's [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result or 1 [Hit] result to a [Focus] result.

pilots.name: Barriss Offee

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Conflicted Padawan
pilots.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 performs an attack, if the defender is in its [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to change 1 [Focus] result to a [Hit] result or 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

pilots.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Guardian of the Republic
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 spends a focus token, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship gains 1 focus token.

pilots.name: Saesee Tiin

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Prophetic Pilot
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-2 reveals its dial, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, set its dial to another maneuver of the same speed and difficulty.

pilots.name: Mace Windu

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Harsh Traditionalist
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1 [Force].

pilots.name: Plo Koon

shipAbility.name: Fine-tuned Controls
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Boost] or [Barrel Roll] action.

pilots.caption: Serene Mentor
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 [Force] and choose another friendly ship at range 0-2. If you do, you may transfer 1 green token to it or transfer one orange token from it to yourself.

pilots.name: “Tucker”
pilots.caption: Blue Five
pilots.ability: After a friendly ship at range 1-2 performs an attack against an enemy ship in your [Front Arc], you may perform a [Focus] action.

pilots.name: Gold Squadron Trooper
pilots.text: The V-19 Torrent starfighter was designed to be a light escort to nimble Delta-7 interceptors flown by Jedi Knights, and has a unique flight profile to reflect this role.

pilots.name: “Swoop”
pilots.caption: Blue Six
pilots.ability: After a friendly small or medium ship fully executes a speed 3-4 maneuver, if it is at range 0-1, it may perform a red [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Blue Squadron Protector
pilots.text: Blue Squadron's elite clone pilots are trained to fly their V-19s in conjunction with Jedi and often support famous commanders such as Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano.

pilots.name: “Odd Ball”
pilots.caption: CC-2237
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], you may acquire a lock on that ship.

pilots.name: “Kickback”
pilots.caption: Blue Four
pilots.ability: After you perform a [Barrel Roll] action, you may perform a red [Lock] action.

pilots.name: “Axe”
pilots.caption: Blue Two
pilots.ability: After you defend or perform an attack, you may choose a friendly ship at range 1-2 in your [Left Arc] or [Right Arc]. If you do, transfer 1 green token to that ship.

pilots.name: Anakin Skywalker

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.caption: Hero of Naboo
pilots.ability: Before you reveal your maneuver, you may spend 1 [Force] to barrel roll (this is not an action).

pilots.name: Ric Olié

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.caption: Bravo Leader
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the speed of your revealed maneuver is higher than the enemy ship's, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Padmé Amidala

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.caption: Aggressive Negotiator
pilots.ability: While an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] defends or performs an attack, that ship can modify only 1 [Focus] result (other results can still be modified).

pilots.name: Dineé Ellberger

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.caption: Bravo Five

pilots.name: Bravo Flight Officer
pilots.text: The volunteer pilots of the Royal Naboo Security Force are dedicated to protecting the people and ideals of their homeworld, and trust their Queen to send them into battle only when all other options have failed.

shipAbility.name: Full Throttle
shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.name: Naboo Handmaiden

shipAbility.text: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may perform an [Evade] action.

pilots.caption: Regal Ruse
pilots.ability: Setup: After placing forces, assign the Decoyed condition to 1 friendly ship other than Naboo Handmaiden.

pilots.name: Shadow Squadron Veteran
pilots.text: Shadow Squadron has served since the early days of the Clone Wars, winning victories at Kadavo and against the flagship of Grievous, Malevolence.

pilots.name: Jedi General
pilots.text: As the Clone Wars take their toll on the ranks of the Jedi Order, those that remain must assume even greater responsibilities in the Grand Army of the Republic.

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a purple [Barrel Roll] or purple [Boost] action.

pilots.name: Shaak Ti

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a purple [Barrel Roll] or purple [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Compassionate Mentor
pilots.ability: At the start of the End Phase, you may spend any number of [Force] to choose that many friendly ships at range 0-2. Each chosen ship does not remove 1 focus or evade token during this End Phase.

pilots.name: Aayla Secura

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a purple [Barrel Roll] or purple [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Confident Warrior
pilots.ability: While an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 0-1 performs an attack, the defender may change 1 blank result to a [Focus] result.

pilots.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a purple [Barrel Roll] or purple [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Guardian of Democracy
pilots.ability: After you or a friendly Anakin Skywalker ship at range 0-3 executes a maneuver, if there are more enemy ships than other friendly ships at range 0-1 of that ship, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship gains 1 focus token.

pilots.name: Yoda

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a purple [Barrel Roll] or purple [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Grand Master
pilots.ability: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 spends 1 or more [Force], you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship recovers 1 [Force].

pilots.name: Anakin Skywalker

shipAbility.name: Intuitive Controls
shipAbility.text: During the System Phase, you may perform a purple [Barrel Roll] or purple [Boost] action.

pilots.caption: Hero of Coruscant
pilots.ability: After you or a friendly Obi-Wan Kenobi ship at range 0-3 executes a maneuver, if there are more enemy ships than other friendly ships at range 0-1 of that ship, you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, that ship removes 1 red token of your choice.

shipAbility.name: Hyperspace Docking Ring
shipAbility.text: 1 Delta-7 Aethersprite, Eta-2 Actis, or Nimbus-class V-wing can dock with you. While a ship is docked with you, you gain that ships initiative and are assigned that ship's dial. While you execute a maneuver, reduce its speed to 1. Before you execute an advanced maneuver, execute a white stationary maneuver [Stationary] instead, then you may rotate 90° or 180°. While no ship is docked with you, you are not assigned a maneuver dial and do not activate or engage.

pilots.name: 212th Battalion Pilot
pilots.text: Capable of functioning in space assaults and atmospheric battles alike, the LAAT/i gunship transports Republic troops to battlefronts on planets besieged by the Separatists.

shipAbility.name: Fire Convergence
shipAbility.text: While a friendly ship performs a non-[Single Turret Arc] attack, if the defender is in your [Single Turret Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the attacker rerolls up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.name: “Hawk”

shipAbility.name: Fire Convergence
shipAbility.text: While a friendly ship performs a non-[Single Turret Arc] attack, if the defender is in your [Single Turret Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the attacker rerolls up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.caption: Valkyrie 2929
pilots.ability: At the start of the End Phase, each friendly ship at range 0-1 that has a revealed maneuver of speed 3-5 may gain 1 strain token to perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action.

pilots.name: “Warthog”

shipAbility.name: Fire Convergence
shipAbility.text: While a friendly ship performs a non-[Single Turret Arc] attack, if the defender is in your [Single Turret Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the attacker rerolls up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.caption: Veteran of Kadavo
pilots.ability: After you or a friendly non-limited ship at range 0-2 are destroyed during the Engagement Phase, that ship is not removed until the end of that phase.

pilots.name: “Hound”

shipAbility.name: Fire Convergence
shipAbility.text: While a friendly ship performs a non-[Single Turret Arc] attack, if the defender is in your [Single Turret Arc], you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the attacker rerolls up to 2 attack dice.

pilots.caption: Vigilant Tracker
pilots.ability: After a friendly small ship in your [Single Turret Arc] gains a deplete or strain token, if you have no tokens of that type, you may transfer that token to yourself.

pilots.name: Loyalist Volunteer
pilots.text: The Kuat Systems Engineering Alpha-3 Nimbus-class V-wing is the vessel of choice for clone and non-clone starfighter pilots alike. The techniques pioneered to mass-produce its precision ion engines will later be crucial in the development of the TIE series by Sienar Fleet Systems.

shipAbility.name: Twin Ion Engines
shipAbility.text: Ignore the “TIE” ship restriction on upgrade cards.

pilots.name: “Contrail”

shipAbility.name: Twin Ion Engines
shipAbility.text: Ignore the “TIE” ship restriction on upgrade cards.

pilots.caption: CT-4981
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if the bearing of your revealed maneuver is the same as the enemy ship's, you may change 1 of the enemy ship's [Focus] results to a blank result.

pilots.name: “Klick”

shipAbility.name: Twin Ion Engines
shipAbility.text: Ignore the “TIE” ship restriction on upgrade cards.

pilots.caption: GC-1000
pilots.ability: While a ship that you have locked at range 1-3 defends or performs an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] to prevent range bonuses from being applied.

pilots.name: “Odd Ball”

shipAbility.name: Twin Ion Engines
shipAbility.text: Ignore the “TIE” ship restriction on upgrade cards.

pilots.caption: CC-2237
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver or perform a red action, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], you may acquire a lock on that ship.

pilots.name: Shadow Squadron Escort
pilots.text: In the waning months of the Clone Wars, elite clone formations carry out missions critical to the future of the Republic; such as the protection of Supreme Chancellor Palpatine's personal shuttle.

shipAbility.name: Twin Ion Engines
shipAbility.text: Ignore the “TIE” ship restriction on upgrade cards.

pilots.name: Wilhuff Tarkin

shipAbility.name: Twin Ion Engines
shipAbility.text: Ignore the “TIE” ship restriction on upgrade cards.

pilots.caption: Aspiring Admiral
pilots.ability: During the System Phase, you may choose an object that you have locked at range 1-3. Another friendly ship at range 1-3 may acquire a lock on that object.

pilots.name: Republic Judiciary
pilots.text: The Galactic Republic uses small, swift warships such as the CR90 corvette to respond rapidly to Separatist incursions across the galaxy.

shipAbility.name: Broadside Batteries
shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks and perform primary attacks at range 1-4.

shipAbility.text: You can acquire locks and perform primary attacks at range 1-4.

pilots.name: “Slider”

shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.caption: Evasive Aviator
pilots.ability: When you reveal a [2 [Bank Left]] or [2 [Bank Right]] maneuver, you may spend 2 [Charge] to execute it as a sideslip.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame

pilots.caption: Scrappy Flier

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.name: “Knack”

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.caption: Incautious Instructor
pilots.ability: After you are destroyed, you may choose a friendly non-limited ship and assign 1 of your equipped [Talent] upgrades to it. End of Game: Return all [Talent] upgrades to their original ships.

pilots.name: Reaper Squadron Scout
pilots.text: Despite the Clone Z-95's unglamorous reputation, Reaper Squadron has become legendary for their skill with this fighter in far-flung engagements, such as the skirmish over Castilon.

shipAbility.name: Versatile Frame
shipAbility.text: You can equip 1 [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade. While your revealed maneuver is blue, add white [Boost] to your action bar.

pilots.name: Bo-Katan Kryze
pilots.caption: Nite Owl Commander
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may gain 1 deplete token to choose an object in your [Front Arc] at range 1-2. If you do, another friendly ship may perform a [Lock] action to lock that object.
